feed.title: Track Awesome Eslint Updates Weekly
feed.subtitle: A list of awesome ESLint plugins, configs, etc.

entry.title: Awesome Eslint Updates on Jun 02 - Jun 08, 2025
entry.content:
Plugins / Frameworks

  • React
    • JSX a11y (⭐3.5k) - Accessibility rules on JSX elements.
    • React (⭐9.2k) - Linting rules for React and JSX.
    • React Hooks (⭐237k) - Linting rules for React Hooks.
    • React Native (⭐745) - React Native specific linting rules.
    • React-Redux (⭐84) - React-Redux specific linting rules.
    • React Refresh (⭐289) - Improve HMR experience when using Vite.

Plugins / Practices and Specific ES Features

  • eslint-plugin-error-cause (⭐14) - A plugin to preserve original error context when re-throwing exceptions.
  • Math (⭐13) - ESLint plugin related to Math object and Number.
entry.summary: 3 awesome projects updated on Jun 02 - Jun 08, 2025

entry.title: Awesome Eslint Updates on May 19 - May 25, 2025
entry.content:
Plugins / Code Quality

  • SonarJS (⭐1.1k) - Rules detecting bugs and suspicious patterns.
  • eslint-plugin-code-complete (⭐5) - A custom ESLint plugin that enforces principles of clean, maintainable software design — inspired by Code Complete.

Plugins / Practices and Specific ES Features

  • import-x (⭐568) - Linting of ES2015+ import/export syntax, and prevent issues with misspelling of file paths and import names. Lightweight fork of eslint-plugin-import, but which breaks backwards compatibility.
entry.summary: 3 awesome projects updated on May 19 - May 25, 2025

entry.title: Awesome Eslint Updates on May 12 - May 18, 2025
entry.content:
Plugins / Code Quality

  • De Morgan (⭐278) - Transforms logical expressions in code to make them easier to understand.

Plugins / CSS in JS

  • vanilla-extract (⭐27) - An ESLint plugin for enforcing CSS property ordering in vanilla-extract CSS (⭐10k) styles.

Plugins / Style

  • split-and-sort-imports (⭐0) - Sorts imports and splits 'multiple' imports into single line imports.
  • @gitbutler/no-relative-imports - Use paths from tsconfig and auto fix relative paths to aliases. Observes tsconfig inheritance.

Tutorials / Testing Tools

  • Dear Old ESLint - Quick intro article on ESLint.
entry.summary: 5 awesome projects updated on May 12 - May 18, 2025

entry.title: Awesome Eslint Updates on Oct 14 - Oct 20, 2024
entry.content:
Plugins / Practices and Specific ES Features

  • import (⭐5.8k) - Linting of ES2015+ import/export syntax, and prevent issues with misspelling of file paths and import names.
entry.summary: 1 awesome projects updated on Oct 14 - Oct 20, 2024

entry.title: Awesome Eslint Updates on Jul 08 - Jul 14, 2024
entry.content:
Plugins / Compatibility

  • es-x (⭐139) - Disable specific ECMAScript language versions or individual features. Properly maintained fork of no longer maintained eslint-plugin-es.

Plugins / Languages and Environments

  • N (⭐291) - Additional ESLint's rules for Node.js. Properly maintained fork of no longer maintained eslint-plugin-node.

Plugins / Practices and Specific ES Features

  • @eslint-community/eslint-plugin-eslint-comments (⭐76) - Best practices about ESLint directive comments (/*eslint-disable*/, etc.). Properly maintained fork of no longer maintained eslint-plugin-eslint-comments.
  • ReDoS - ESLint plugin for finding possible ReDoS vulnerabilities.
  • ReDoSDetector (⭐12) - ESLint plugin for finding possible ReDoS vulnerabilities.

Plugins / Style

  • ESLint Stylistic - Formatting and stylistic ESLint core rules moved to this project and are maintained by the community.
  • filenames (⭐323) - Ensure consistent filenames for your JavaScript files. No longer maintained and does not work with ESlint 9 at all.
entry.summary: 7 awesome projects updated on Jul 08 - Jul 14, 2024

entry.title: Awesome Eslint Updates on Jul 01 - Jul 07, 2024
entry.content:
Plugins / Code Quality

  • depend (⭐404) - Helps detect dependency tree bloat and redundant polyfills.

Tools / Testing Tools

  • eslint-plugin-rule-adoption (⭐1) - An eslint plugin for incremental rule adoption, when --fix and codemods don't cut it.
entry.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Jul 01 - Jul 07, 2024

entry.title: Awesome Eslint Updates on Jun 24 - Jun 30, 2024
entry.content:
Configs / Other Prominent Configs (100 stars or so)

  • Antfu Eslint Config (⭐5.4k) - Anthony's ESLint config preset.

Preconfigured Configs with ESLint Set up / Other Configs

  • eslint-config-prettier (⭐5.7k) - Prettier config for ESlint maintained by Prettier team.

Parsers / Testing Tools

  • babel-eslint-parser (⭐44k) - Allows you to lint ALL valid Babel code with the fantastic ESLint.

Formatters / Testing Tools

  • html (⭐38) - A enhanced ESLint formatter.
entry.summary: 4 awesome projects updated on Jun 24 - Jun 30, 2024

entry.content:

  • clean-typescript (⭐1) - Enforce classic JavaScript featuress in TypeScript codebase by banning excessive keywords.

Plugins / Style

entry.content:
Plugins / Frameworks

  • Meteor (⭐45k) - Meteor specific linting rules for ESLint.

Globals / Testing Tools

  • confusing-browser-globals (⭐103k) - A curated list of browser globals that commonly cause confusion and are not recommended to use without an explicit window. qualifier.

Developing for ESLint / Testing Tools

  • eslint-docgen (⭐10) - Automatically generate ESLint plugin documentation from rule metadata and test cases.

entry.title: Awesome Eslint Updates on Oct 17 - Oct 23, 2022
entry.content:
Plugins / Misc

  • Misc (⭐11) - Miscellaneous rules including rules for creating custom checks and wrapping (modifying) third-party rules.

Plugins / Practices and Specific ES Features

  • eslint-plugin-hexagonal-architecture (⭐308) - A plugin that helps you to enforce hexagonal architecture best practices.
  • no-argument-spread (⭐3) - Lints against expressions like Math.max(...args) that can lead to a stack overflow for large arrays.

entry.content:

entry.content:

    • JSON (⭐213) - Lint your JSON files.
    • JSON, package.json (⭐41) - Lint, format, and auto-fix your JSON files. Sort your package.json.

    • JSON Schema (⭐80) - Validates data defined in JavaScript, JSON, YAML and TOML using JSON Schema Validator.

entry.content:
Configs / Other Prominent Configs (100 stars or so)

  • Auto (⭐404) - Automatically configure ESLint based on your project's dependencies.

Configs / Other Configs

Plugins / Languages and Environments

  • HTML (⭐233) - ESLint plugin for HTML.
  • TOML (⭐28) - ESLint plugin for TOML.

entry.content:
Plugins / Practices and Specific ES Features

  • no-constructor-bind (⭐12) - Encourages use of class properties by reporting use of this with bind or setting state in constructors.

Plugins / Style

  • const case - Enforce capitalization of constant primitive literals.
  • editorconfig (⭐16) - Derive rules from .editorconfig.

Tools / Testing Tools

  • generator-eslint (⭐238) - Generate ESLint plugin and rules with Yeoman.

entry.title: Awesome Eslint Updates on Jul 20 - Jul 26, 2020
entry.content:
Configs / Configs by Well-Known Companies/Organizations

  • Airbnb-babel (⭐3) - Airbnb's ESLint config with Babel Support.

Formatters / Testing Tools

  • badger (⭐7) - Make SVG-based badges summarizing ESLint results (e.g., for use on a README).
  • git-log (⭐41) - ESLint Formatter featuring Git Author, Date, and Hash.
  • github (⭐107) - See ESLint errors and warnings directly in pull requests.
  • gitlab - Output ESLint results in the GitLab code quality results.
  • mo (⭐131) - Good-lookin' ESLint formatter and also for delightful reading experience.
  • summary-chart (⭐12) - Format ESLint output into a bar chart.
entry.summary: 7 awesome projects updated on Jul 20 - Jul 26, 2020

entry.title: Awesome Eslint Updates on Jun 29 - Jul 05, 2020
entry.content:
Preconfigured Configs with ESLint Set up / Other Configs

  • Node.js Standard Style (⭐6) - Node.js core config.
  • Standard (⭐29k) - JavaScript Standard Style.
  • Superlint (⭐5) - JavaScript Supermind Style.
  • XO (⭐7.8k) - JavaScript happiness style linter ❤️.

Parsers / Testing Tools

  • TypeScript (⭐16k) - A TypeScript parser that produces output compatible with ESLint.
  • BrightScript (⭐47) - BrightScript plugin for Roku development. Includes Parser and Rules.

Globals / Testing Tools

  • ES and browser globals (⭐499) (originally from ESLint)
  • chai globals (⭐2)
entry.summary: 8 awesome projects updated on Jun 29 - Jul 05, 2020

entry.title: Awesome Eslint Updates on Jun 22 - Jun 28, 2020
entry.content:
Configs / Configs by Well-Known Companies/Organizations

  • Shopify (⭐479) - Shareable config for Shopify's style guide (⭐258).

Plugins / Code Quality

  • Unicorn (⭐4.6k) - Various awesome ESLint rules.

Plugins / Compatibility

  • Compat (⭐3.1k) - Lint browser compatibility of APIs used (caniuse as an ESLint plugin).
  • ecmascript-compat (⭐69) - Disable ECMAScript language features not supported by your browserslist targets.
  • es5 (⭐55) - ESLint plugin for ES5 users (forbid ES2015+ usage).
  • ie11 (⭐15) - Detect unsupported ES6 features in IE11.

Plugins / Deprecation

  • deprecate (⭐82) - Mark functions or modules as deprecated and get lint messages when they are used.
  • disable (⭐56) - Disable specified plugins using file path patterns and inline comments.

Plugins / Embedded

  • HTML (⭐442) - Linting for JavaScript inside of HTML <script> tags.
  • Markdown (⭐472) - Linting for JavaScript inside of Markdown.

Plugins / Frameworks

  • Vue
    • VueJS (⭐4.5k) - Plugin for VueJS.
    • VueJS Scoped CSS (⭐108) - Plugin for Scoped CSS in VueJS.

Plugins / Languages and Environments

  • Flow
    • Flow (⭐1.1k) - Flow type linting rules.
    • Flow Errors (⭐403) - Run Flow as an ESLint plugin.
  • SQL (⭐107) - SQL linting rules for ESLint.
  • TypeScript (⭐16k) - Linting rules for TypeScript.

Plugins / Libraries

  • Lodash
    • Lodash (⭐279) - Lodash specific linting rules.
    • Lodash/fp (⭐151) - Lodash/fp specific linting rules.
    • Lodash template (⭐17) - Plugin for Lodash template/Underscore template.
    • Microtemplates (⭐4) (Used in Lodash and Underscore.js)

Plugins / Misc

  • PutOut (⭐756) - an ESLint plugin integrates putout (⭐756) linter into ESLint.

Plugins / Practices and Specific ES Features

  • boundaries (⭐673) - Ensures that your architecture boundaries are respected by the elements in your project checking file structure and dependencies.
  • Immutable (⭐911) - Disable all mutation in JavaScript.

Plugins / Performance

  • DOM (⭐9)
  • Optimize Regex (⭐76) - Optimize regex literals.
  • Perf-Standard plugin (⭐23) and Config (⭐3)

Plugins / Testing Tools

  • Cypress (⭐717) - Linting rules for Cypress.
  • Jest
    • Enforcing practices (⭐1.2k) - Linting rules for Jest.
    • Enforcing consistent formatting (⭐155) - Formatting rules for Jest.
    • Jest-async - Async linting rule for Jest.
    • Jest-DOM (⭐368) - Linting rules for Jest-DOM.
entry.summary: 23 awesome projects updated on Jun 22 - Jun 28, 2020

entry.title: Awesome Eslint Updates on Jun 15 - Jun 21, 2020
entry.content:
Plugins / Misc

  • Only-Error (⭐17) - Convert all rules to errors.
  • Only-Warn (⭐175) - Convert all rules to warnings.

Plugins / Testing Tools

  • Testing Library (⭐1k) - Linting rules for Testing Library.
entry.summary: 3 awesome projects updated on Jun 15 - Jun 21, 2020

entry.title: Awesome Eslint Updates on Jun 08 - Jun 14, 2020
entry.content:
Plugins / Security

  • no-secrets (⭐151) - An eslint plugin that detects potential secrets/credentials.
  • no-unsanitized (⭐238) - Checks for innerHTML, outerHTML, etc.
  • Security (⭐2.3k) - ESLint rules for Node Security.
  • xss (⭐68) - Tries to detect XSS issues in codebase before they end up in production.
entry.summary: 4 awesome projects updated on Jun 08 - Jun 14, 2020

entry.title: Awesome Eslint Updates on Jun 01 - Jun 07, 2020
entry.content:
Configs / Configs by Well-Known Companies/Organizations

  • Wikimedia (⭐32) - Shareable config for Wikimedia's style guide, used by MediaWiki.

Configs / Other Prominent Configs (100 stars or so)

  • Canonical (⭐616) - Shareable config for Canonical style guide (⭐18).
  • Standard (⭐2.6k) - Shareable config for JavaScript Standard Style (⭐29k).
  • XO (⭐274) - Shareable config for XO (⭐7.8k).

Configs / Other Configs

  • Ash-Nazg (⭐6) - One config to rule them all!
  • Cecilia (⭐7) - ESLint configuration for awesome projects.
  • Hardcore (⭐450) - The most strict (but practical) ESLint config out there.
  • Problems (⭐67) - Shareable config that only catches actual problems, and doesn't enforce stylistic preferences.
  • Supermind (⭐4) - Shareable config for Supermind style.

Plugins / Libraries

  • jQuery (⭐32) - Linting rules for jQuery, including versioned configs for deprecated features.

Plugins / Testing Tools

  • AVA (⭐229) - Linting rules for AVA.
  • Cucumber (⭐8) - Linting rules for Cucumber.
entry.summary: 12 awesome projects updated on Jun 01 - Jun 07, 2020

entry.title: Awesome Eslint Updates on May 04 - May 10, 2020
entry.content:
Tools / Testing Tools

  • es-file-traverse (⭐2) - Obtain a list of only those files which are in use based on imports and/or requires from an entry file or files; list passable to ESLint. Intended esp. for linting 3rd party dependencies.
entry.summary: 1 awesome projects updated on May 04 - May 10, 2020

entry.title: Awesome Eslint Updates on Mar 23 - Mar 29, 2020
entry.content:
Plugins / Libraries

  • JSDoc (⭐1.2k) - Linting rules for JSDoc comments (including the JavaScript within @example).

Plugins / Practices and Specific ES Features

  • no-restricted-syntax (⭐5) - Show queried syntax's content in messages.
  • sort-keys-fix (⭐100) - Adds fixer for ESLint sort-keys rule.

Plugins / Testing Tools

  • Chai
    • expect practices (⭐27)
    • with unused expressions (⭐56)
    • permitted keywords (⭐1)
    • with chai-as-promised plugin (⭐4)
    • globals (⭐2)
  • Mocha
    • Enforcing practices (⭐286) - Linting rules for Mocha.
    • Enforcing manageability (⭐13)
  • QUnit (⭐31) - Linting rules for QUnit.
entry.summary: 6 awesome projects updated on Mar 23 - Mar 29, 2020

  • functional (⭐932) - ESLint rules to disable mutation and promote fp in JavaScript and TypeScript.

entry.content:

entry.title: Awesome Eslint Updates on Dec 09 - Dec 15, 2019
entry.content:

entry.title: Awesome Eslint Updates on Oct 15 - Oct 21, 2018
entry.content:
Configs / Configs by Well-Known Companies/Organizations

  • Airbnb (⭐147k) - Shareable config for Airbnb's style guide (⭐147k).

Plugins / Frameworks

  • Backbone (⭐95) - Linting rules for Backbone.
  • Hapi (⭐21) - Linting rules for hapi.

Plugins / Libraries

  • Mongodb (⭐20) - Mongodb native Node.js driver linting rules.
  • Ramda (⭐117) - Ramda specific linting rules.
  • RequireJS (⭐29) - Linting rules for RequireJS.

Plugins / Practices and Specific ES Features

  • fp (⭐970) - ESLint rules for functional programming.
  • new-with-error (⭐26) - Require errors to be thrown using new.
  • no-use-extend-native (⭐56) - Prevent using extended native objects.
  • Promise (⭐971) - Best practices when working with promises.
  • this (⭐16) - Write pure functions, don't allow this.

Tools / Testing Tools

  • eslint-find-rules (⭐213) - Find built-in ESLint rules you don't have in your custom config.
  • eslint-index (⭐21) - CLI for finding and managing rules in ESLint config files.
  • eslint-multiplexer (⭐7) - Multiplex eslint results and merge results for common files.
  • eslint-nibble (⭐848) - Ease into ESLint, by fixing one rule at a time.
  • eslint-rule-documentation (⭐30) - Find the url for the documentation of an ESLint rule.
  • eslint-watch (⭐198) - Run ESLint with watch mode.
  • codacy-eslint (⭐16) - Docker used at Codacy to run ESLint.
  • esprint (⭐664) - Run ESLint across multiple threads.

Tutorials / Testing Tools

  • Creating an ESLint Plugin - Article walking through the creation of an ESLint rule and plugin.
  • Writing a rule to spot undeclared props hiding in plain sight - Article about creating rules that require scope analysis.
entry.summary: 21 awesome projects updated on Oct 15 - Oct 21, 2018
